snippet: After shootings in Charleston, S.C., and elsewhere, the promise President Obama’s election brought for improved relations among the races seems out of reach.
abstract: Pres Obama addresses shooting massacre at historically black church in Charleston, SC, again facing virulent racial turmoil that has challenged him to bring the American people together in recent months; massacre follows string of police shootings, protests and riots that have given lie to 'postracial' era some associated with Obama's presidency.
lead_paragraph: After shootings in Charleston, S.C., and elsewhere, the promise President Obama’s election brought for improved relations among the races seems out of reach.

headline.main: After Charleston Shooting, a Sense at the White House of Horror, Loss and Resolve
headline.print_headline: A Sense at the White House of Horror, Loss and Resolve

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
